NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 4460? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 3557? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Surgical Treatments or Mental Health?
NC.A: {Surgical Treatments} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.A: {Surgical Treatments} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.
